'''BARÁN''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] given no signification, except from what can be deduced from its derivatives.<ref name=Ety>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 351 (root appearing as "BARÁN-")</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Quenya]] ''varne'' ("brown, swart, dark brown")<ref name=Ety/>
*[[Kornoldorin|Old Noldorin]]: ''barane''<ref name=Ety/>
*[[Noldorin|Exilic Noldorin]]: ''[[baran (Sindarin)|baran]]''<ref name=Ety/>

==See also==

*[[RUSKĀ]]
*[[baran (Sindarin)]]
